sourcesContent:
import './index.css' const WinOrLoseCard = props => { const {score} = props let result let scoreText let resultImg if (score === 12) { result = 'Won' scoreText = 'Best Score' resultImg = 'https://assets.ccbp.in/frontend/react-js/won-game-img.png' } else { result = 'Lose' scoreText = 'Score' resultImg = 'https://assets.ccbp.in/frontend/react-js/lose-game-img.png' } return (

You {result}

{scoreText}

{score}/12

) } export default WinOrLoseCard
